entry.title: Newsletter #34
entry.content:
First of all, some self-promotion: a few weeks ago we had an internal presentation about the future of tech at Namshi, have a look! ;–)

And now…

…another TechThursday here! Even though we might be a little late, here are the links that the share among the team.

  • Refactoring Legacy code
  • How to Lie with Data Visualization
  • 7 backbone.js mistakes you must fix today — a list not only restricted to backbone!
  • Dispelling the hate against PHP
  • Underscore in PHP
  • Yeoman Angular full stack generator
  • Yeoman Ionic Angular generator
  • Whatever goes up, that’s what we do (facebook approach to feature release)
  • Comparing Node.js Promises, Try/Catch, Angular Zone.js and yes, Zone
  • The responsive man…
  • Rethinking enterprise software
  • Lean UX Development
  • Webservers shouldn’t have direct access to keys
  • Ractive.js -The diamond age of web development

entry.title: Newsletter #33
entry.content:
Heya! even though it’s late, there always time for the Namshi newsletter!

Here you go with the interesting resources we’ve spotted over the last week.

  • Hacker News, Designer News and Product Hunt all together!

  • jsDay and phpDay in Italy
  • Famo.us is now open source
  • Linux Exploit Suggester (based on operating system release number)
  • A system exploration and troubleshooting tool

entry.title: Newsletter #31
entry.content:
It’s TechThursday again: here’s what we’ve been excited about over the past week!

Oh, before the news, give us 3 seconds to announce that:

  • our IOS app is available in the AppStore!
  • we released a new TV commercial!
  • we are looking for a frontend and backend code monkeys!

And now…this week in Tech:

  • A PHP VM running over PyPy
  • What the heck is Hack?
  • Showcases of software built through GitHub
  • Benchmarking Redis on Elasticache
  • Debug anything with RR
  • How to clone a 10GB repo?
  • How to Shrink a Git Repository
  • Why I’m Excited About Object.observe
  • Lesser-Known JavaScript Debugging Techniques
  • 12 Git Hosting Services Compared
  • Mobile app development frameworks
  • Loading translations from a db in Symfony 2
